title: Erotic horror
text: Erotic horror, alternately called horror erotica or dark erotica, is a term applied to works of fiction in which sensual or sexual imagery are blended with horrific overtones or story elements for the sake of <a href="sexual%20titillation">sexual titillation</a>. <a href="Horror%20fiction">Horror fiction</a> of this type is most common in <a href="Erotic%20literature">literature</a> and film. Erotic horror films are a cornerstone of Spanish horror.
